name: Professional Scrum Master vs Certified Scrum Master
description: In the world of project management and Agile approaches, Scrum Master certifications play a pivotal role in establishing one's credibility and expertise. The most recognized Scrum certification is Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM®), with the Professional Scrum Master ™ (PSM ™) in second place. Let's understand the differences between the two. Professional Scrum Master (PSM) The PSM ...
